description:
Apache web server is known to be the most popular web server application in the internet world and it's free .

This course is about web server administration , consentrating on (Apache) web server .

In this course you will learn the following

- apache web server installation on linux centos

- making virtual hosts (name based , ip based and port based virtual host)

- install mysql and php (LAMP)

- apache security

- apache logs

This course is designed for beginners who would like to learn about apache web server on linux centos and be able to administrate it .

This course will be very helpful for beginners , and the student may ask any questions about the course or about linux in general and we will be happy to share knowledge with others .

finally we hope that students will find this course worthy and learn and enjoy linux .

regards ,,
Muhammed Tork , Mohammed Yehia
title: Learning Apache Web Server Administration
